title: 14, Annotated
additional_documentation_required: Certification of registration or qualification with the State Department of Assessments and Taxation
Financial disclosure filings with the Secretary of State of Maryland (if contracts reach $100,000 aggregate)
Political contribution disclosure statements with the State Board of Elections (if contracts reach $200,000 aggregate)
Internal drug and alcohol-free workplace policy statement for employees
bid_summary: This document is a required affidavit for businesses contracting with the State of Maryland. It affirms the business's legal authority and certifies its compliance with state registration requirements, financial disclosure laws (for contracts over $100,000 aggregate), political contribution disclosure laws (for contracts over $200,000 aggregate), and drug and alcohol-free workplace policies. It ensures the business's good standing and commitment to various state regulations.
